timeline.message: OC-560 ~ Solves some sonar issues in pom files

timeline.bodyText: I think this comment can be removed.
timeline.author: robindenadel

timeline.bodyText: This class seems a copy of the KafkaConfig class in the webservice client. I think we should put common code in the shared library.
timeline.author: robindenadel

replies.bodyText: For now it would make the class more easier to read without the consumer code. Instead of all the commented lines of code, you could have one comment stating the consumer part has not been implemented yet.
replies.author: robindenadel

replies.bodyText: Removed commented consumer code, refactored configuration and moved common code to shared.
replies.author: smvdheijden

timeline.bodyText: I really wish you didn't use that.

replies.author: smvdheijden

timeline.bodyText: This code was good enough for the POC. I doubt if it is good enough now.
timeline.author: robindenadel

replies.bodyText: Leaving for now, will become obsolete when new AVRO message format is defined
replies.author: smvdheijden

timeline.bodyText: Why don't we use an optional with orElseThrow?
timeline.author: robindenadel

replies.bodyText:
Not all repositories are already updated to return optionals. Dependent of the usage of the methods throughout the code, refactoring to use optionals might be a lot of work.
In this case the method in the repository was referenced only a few times, so therefor I
refactored it to use an optional.
The findOrganisation method in this class could also use the same refactoring, however updating the organisationRepository will have a greater impact (more references in more value streams), so I'll guess I won't do this now...
replies.author: smvdheijden

timeline.bodyText: there is no param notification Type
timeline.author: robindenadel

replies.bodyText: No use of having this javadocs above a private method. Removed.
replies.author: smvdheijden
